description: Prebid Cache only allows to store JSON or XML types and the type field is required. Respond with error

expectedLogEntries.message: POST /cache Error while writing to the back-end: Type must be one of ["json", "xml"]. Found
POST /cache had an unexpected error:Type must be one of ["json", "xml"]. Found

expectedErrorMessage: Type must be one of ["json", "xml"]. Found
